name: Test Data
description:
The Test Data plugin can generate multiple types of test data and gives you the option to specify custom formats.


Helps to generate multiple types of test data.

Use Generate (Ctrl+N/Cmd+N) menu in any text file to insert random test data of the selected type.


Supported formats include:

  • Names, addresses, sentences;
  • Different types of numbers and dates;
  • Emails, UUIDs, URLs, IP Addresses;
  • And more.

    • Specify custom formats and generate multiple items at once.


    Test Data plugin is a part of the toolset for QA specialists and teams.

    Subscribe to our QA Tools Twitter to be the first to hear about our new features as they are released!
